availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Eulett Stafford in Lewis County, Kentucky, on February 23, 1844. Father of Elizabeth Stafford, Thomas Stafford, Polly Stafford, James Stafford, William D. Stafford, John Stafford, and Ralph Stafford. Farmer in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860. Farmer in Lewis County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 235A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 943.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Laurel Precinct, p. 480B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994045, Lewis County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344051, p. 82.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lewis County, KY, October 1863, p. 135.
